controllers

Class ControllerForGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.ControllerForGame

  • public class ControllerForGame
extends java.lang.Object
    MVC - Controller that controls the interaction between models and view.
    Author:
    raghavsharda, gursharandeep

      • ControllerForGame

        public ControllerForGame(java.lang.String newMap,
                         java.lang.String[][] players,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> countryList,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> armyCountList,
                         java.lang.String currentPlayer,
                         java.lang.String phaseName)
        Controller constructor to load the saved game state.
        Parameters:
        newMap - map file path
        currentPlayer - current player of the game
        armyCountList - army count for each country
        countryList - country list of each player
        players - game players
        phaseName - name of the phase ongoing.
